full_summary:
## Tender Notice #
### Government of Canada

#### Tender Title #
TBIPS RFP W8474-24DB05
**English Summary:** 
The Digital Biometrics Collection and Identity Management (DBCIDM) project requires the professional services of a Network Analyst, Systems Administrator, and a Helpdesk Specialist under the Technology Acquisition Media Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement. 

**French Summary:** 
Le projet de Collecte de données biométriques numériques et gestion de l’identité (CDBNGI) a besoin des services professionnels d’une analyste de réseau, d’un administrateur de systèmes et d’un spécialiste de dépannage sous l’Accord d’approvisionnement en services de media de l’achat de technologie (TBIPS)

- **Contract Title:** Digital Biometrics Collection and Identity Management (DBCIDM)
- **Category:** Supplier Services (SRV)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
- **Publication Date:** June 26, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:**
	+ July 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 21, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** July 21, 2024
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa
- **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Contracting Entity:** Director of Electronic Systems Procurement 3
- **Address:** 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
- **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Juan Saenz
	+ Email: MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 596-7090
- **Attachments:**
	+ TBD
	+ Q&A Doc 6 - English
	+ Q&A Doc 6 - French
	+ Q&A Doc 5 - English
	...
- **Trade Agreements:** The solicitation is subject to the following Trade Agreements:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

#### Security Exigencies #
*	Minimum Corporate Security Required: Reliability
*	Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability
